source:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Award, FileText, CheckCircle, Clock, TrendingUp, Search, Target, BookOpen, ArrowUpRight, Calendar, DollarSign, Building, Star, Eye, Plus } from 'lucide-react'; interface OverviewProps { profile: any; scholarships: any[]; applications: any[]; stats: { totalApplications: number; approvedApplications: number; pendingApplications: number; availableScholarships: number; }; onApplyScholarship: (scholarshipId: string) => void; } const Overview: React.FC = ({ profile, scholarships, applications, stats, onApplyScholarship }) => { const formatAmount = (amount: number) => { return new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', { style: 'currency', currency: 'USD', minimumFractionDigits: 0 }).format(amount); }; const getStatusColor = (status: string) => { switch (status) { case 'approved': return 'bg-green-100 text-green-800'; case 'rejected': return 'bg-red-100 text-red-800'; case 'under_review': return 'bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800'; default: return 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800'; } }; const getStatusIcon = (status: string) => { switch (status) { case 'approved': return CheckCircle; case 'rejected': return Clock; case 'under_review': return Clock; default: return Clock; } }; const quickActions = [ { title: 'Find Scholarships', description: 'Discover new scholarship opportunities', icon: Search, color: 'bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-500 to-blue-600', link: '/student/dashboard/scholarships', count: stats.availableScholarships }, { title: 'My Applications', description: 'Track your application status', icon: FileText, color: 'bg-gradient-to-r from-green-500 to-green-600', link: '/student/dashboard/applications', count: stats.totalApplications }, { title: 'Update Profile', description: 'Keep your profile current', icon: Target, color: 'bg-gradient-to-r from-purple-500 to-purple-600', link: '/student/dashboard/profile', count: null } ]; return (
{/* Welcome Message */}

Welcome back, {profile?.name || 'Student'}!

Continue your journey to academic excellence

Discover Scholarships

Find opportunities that match your profile

Apply with Confidence

Get guidance throughout the process

Track Your Progress

Monitor applications in real-time

{/* Stats Cards */}

Available Scholarships

{stats.availableScholarships}

New opportunities

My Applications

{stats.totalApplications}

Total submitted

Approved

{stats.approvedApplications}

Successful

Pending

{stats.pendingApplications}

Under review
{/* Quick Actions */}
{quickActions.map((action, index) => { const Icon = action.icon; return (
{action.count !== null && ( {action.count} )}

{action.title}

{action.description}

); })}
{/* Recent Applications */}

Recent Applications

Track your scholarship applications

View All
{applications.length === 0 ? (

No applications yet

Start applying for scholarships to see your progress here

Find Scholarships
) : (
{applications.slice(0, 5).map((application) => { const StatusIcon = getStatusIcon(application.status); return (

{application.scholarship?.title}

{application.scholarship?.schoolName}
{new Date(application.applied_at).toLocaleDateString()}
{application.status.replace('_', ' ').toUpperCase()}
); })}
)}
{/* Recommended Scholarships & Profile Status */}
{/* Profile Completion */}

Profile Status

Basic information
Academic details
Documents uploaded

Complete your profile to unlock more opportunities

Complete now â†’
{/* Recommended Scholarships */}

Recommended for You

{scholarships.slice(0, 3).map((scholarship) => (

{scholarship.title}

{formatAmount(scholarship.amount)} {scholarship.schoolName}
))} {scholarships.length === 0 && (

No recommendations yet

)}
{/* Study Tips */}

ðŸ’¡ Success Tips

Apply early to increase your chances of success

Tailor your applications to each scholarship

Keep your profile updated with latest achievements

); }; export default Overview;

source:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { User, Edit, Save, X, Phone, Mail, Globe, MapPin, BookOpen, GraduationCap, Star, Award, CheckCircle, AlertCircle, Camera, Calendar, Target } from 'lucide-react'; interface ProfileManagementProps { profile: any; onUpdateProfile: (data: any) => void; } const ProfileManagement: React.FC = ({ profile, onUpdateProfile }) => { const [isEditing, setIsEditing] = useState(false); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: profile?.name || '', phone: profile?.phone || '', country: profile?.country || '', field_of_interest: profile?.field_of_interest || '', academic_level: profile?.academic_level || '', gpa: profile?.gpa?.toString() || '', english_proficiency: profile?.english_proficiency || '' }); const handleInputChange = (field: string, value: string) => { setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [field]: value })); }; const handleSave = () => { const updatedData = { ...formData, gpa: parseFloat(formData.gpa) || 0 }; onUpdateProfile(updatedData); setIsEditing(false); }; const handleCancel = () => { setFormData({ name: profile?.name || '', phone: profile?.phone || '', country: profile?.country || '', field_of_interest: profile?.field_of_interest || '', academic_level: profile?.academic_level || '', gpa: profile?.gpa?.toString() || '', english_proficiency: profile?.english_proficiency || '' }); setIsEditing(false); }; const getProfileCompleteness = () => { const fields = [ profile?.name, profile?.phone, profile?.country, profile?.field_of_interest, profile?.academic_level, profile?.gpa, profile?.english_proficiency ]; const completedFields = fields.filter(field => field && field !== '').length; return Math.round((completedFields / fields.length) * 100); }; const completeness = getProfileCompleteness(); return (
{/* Header */}

Student Profile

Manage your academic profile and preferences

{!isEditing && ( )}
{/* Profile Completeness */}

Profile Completeness

Complete your profile to unlock more scholarship opportunities

{completeness}%
Complete
{completeness < 100 && (
Complete your profile to improve scholarship matching
)}
{/* Profile Form */}
{isEditing ? (

Edit Profile

handleInputChange('name', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-4 py-3 bg-slate-50 border border-slate-200 rounded-xl focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-600 focus:border-blue-600 transition-all duration-200" placeholder="Enter your full name" />
handleInputChange('phone', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-4 py-3 bg-slate-50 border border-slate-200 rounded-xl focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-600 focus:border-blue-600 transition-all duration-200" placeholder="Your phone number" />
handleInputChange('country', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-4 py-3 bg-slate-50 border border-slate-200 rounded-xl focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-600 focus:border-blue-600 transition-all duration-200" placeholder="Your country" />
handleInputChange('gpa', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-4 py-3 bg-slate-50 border border-slate-200 rounded-xl focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-600 focus:border-blue-600 transition-all duration-200" placeholder="0.0" />
) : (
{/* Profile Header */}

{profile?.name || 'Student Name'}

{profile?.email}

Active Student Verified
{/* Profile Information */}

Personal Information

{profile?.name || 'Not provided'}

{profile?.email}

{profile?.phone || 'Not provided'}

{profile?.country || 'Not provided'}

Academic Information

{profile?.field_of_interest || 'Not provided'}

{profile?.academic_level || 'Not provided'}

{profile?.gpa || 'Not provided'}

{profile?.english_proficiency || 'Not provided'}

{/* Account Information */}

Account Information

{profile?.created_at ? new Date(profile.created_at).toLocaleDateString() : 'Unknown'}

{completeness}%

)}
{/* Profile Tips */} {completeness < 100 && (

Complete Your Profile

A complete profile helps us match you with the most relevant scholarship opportunities. Consider adding the missing information to improve your chances of finding the perfect scholarships.

{!profile?.phone && ( Add phone number )} {!profile?.country && ( Add country )} {!profile?.field_of_interest && ( Add field of interest )} {!profile?.academic_level && ( Add academic level )} {!profile?.gpa && ( Add GPA )} {!profile?.english_proficiency && ( Add English proficiency )}
)}
); }; export default ProfileManagement;

import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Building, Users, Award, FileText, TrendingUp, AlertCircle, CheckCircle, Clock, DollarSign, Activity, Crown, Shield, Eye, ArrowUpRight, Calendar, Target } from 'lucide-react'; interface OverviewProps { stats: { totalUniversities: number; pendingUniversities: number; approvedUniversities: number; totalStudents: number; totalScholarships: number; totalApplications: number; totalFunding: number; monthlyGrowth: number; }; universities: any[]; users: any[]; applications: any[]; error: string | null; } const Overview: React.FC = ({ stats, universities, users, applications, error }) => { const formatCurrency = (value: number) => { return new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', { style: 'currency', currency: 'USD', minimumFractionDigits: 0 }).format(value); }; const quickActions = [ { title: 'Approve Universities', description: 'Review pending university applications', icon: Building, color: 'bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-500 to-blue-600', link: '/admin/dashboard/universities', count: stats.pendingUniversities }, { title: 'Manage Users', description: 'View and manage user accounts', icon: Users, color: 'bg-gradient-to-r from-green-500 to-green-600', link: '/admin/dashboard/users', count: users.length }, { title: 'Monitor Scholarships', description: 'Track scholarship programs', icon: Award, color: 'bg-gradient-to-r from-purple-500 to-purple-600', link: '/admin/dashboard/scholarships', count: stats.totalScholarships } ]; return (
{/* Error Alert */} {error && (

System Notice

{error}

)} {/* Stats Cards */}

Total Universities

{stats.totalUniversities}

+{stats.monthlyGrowth}% this month

Total Users

{users.length}

{stats.totalStudents} students

Total Scholarships

{stats.totalScholarships}

{formatCurrency(stats.totalFunding)}

Applications

{stats.totalApplications}

Active submissions
{/* Quick Actions */}
{quickActions.map((action, index) => { const Icon = action.icon; return (
{action.count}

{action.title}

{action.description}

); })}
{/* Pending Approvals */}

Pending University Approvals

Universities awaiting admin review

View All
{universities.filter(u => !u.is_approved).length === 0 ? (

All caught up!

No universities pending approval

) : (
{universities.filter(u => !u.is_approved).slice(0, 5).map((university) => (

{university.name}

{university.location}
{new Date(university.created_at).toLocaleDateString()}
))}
)}
{/* System Status & Recent Activity */}
{/* System Status */}

System Status

Database
Operational
API Services
Operational
Email Service
Operational
File Storage
Operational
{/* Recent Activity */}

Recent Activity

{applications.slice(0, 4).map((activity, index) => (

New scholarship application

{activity.scholarship_title} â€¢ {new Date(activity.applied_at).toLocaleDateString()}

))} {applications.length === 0 && (

No recent activity

)}
{/* Admin Tools */}

Admin Tools

System Settings Activity Logs
); }; export default Overview;

import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Building, CheckCircle, XCircle, Eye, Search, Filter, Calendar, MapPin, Globe, Mail, Phone, AlertTriangle, Clock, TrendingUp } from 'lucide-react'; interface UniversityManagementProps { universities: any[]; stats: { total: number; pending: number; approved: number; }; onApprove: (universityId: string) => void; onReject: (universityId: string) => void; } const UniversityManagement: React.FC = ({ universities, stats, onApprove, onReject }) => { const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const [statusFilter, setStatusFilter] = useState('all'); const [selectedUniversity, setSelectedUniversity] = useState(null); const filteredUniversities = universities.filter(university => { const matchesSearch = university.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || university.location?.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()); const matchesStatus = statusFilter === 'all' || (statusFilter === 'approved' && university.is_approved) || (statusFilter === 'pending' && !university.is_approved); return matchesSearch && matchesStatus; }); return (
{/* Stats Cards */}

Total Universities

{stats.total}

Pending Approval

{stats.pending}

Approved

{stats.approved}

{/* Filters */}
setSearchTerm(e.target.value)} className="w-full pl-12 pr-4 py-3 bg-slate-50 border border-slate-200 rounded-xl focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-purple-600 focus:border-purple-600 transition-all duration-200" />
{filteredUniversities.length} universit{filteredUniversities.length !== 1 ? 'ies' : 'y'} found
{/* Universities List */}
{filteredUniversities.map((university) => ( ))}
University Location Contact Status Applied Actions
{university.name}
{university.website && (
{university.website}
)}
{university.location || 'Not provided'}
{university.contact?.email && (
{university.contact.email}
)} {university.contact?.phone && (
{university.contact.phone}
)}
{university.is_approved ? ( <> Approved ) : ( <> Pending )}
{new Date(university.created_at).toLocaleDateString()}
{!university.is_approved && ( <> )}
{filteredUniversities.length === 0 && (

No universities found

{searchTerm ? `No universities match "${searchTerm}"` : 'No universities registered yet'}

)}
{/* University Detail Modal */} {selectedUniversity && (

University Details

Basic Information

{selectedUniversity.name}

{selectedUniversity.location || 'Not provided'}

{selectedUniversity.website || 'Not provided'}

{selectedUniversity.is_approved ? 'Approved' : 'Pending'}
{selectedUniversity.description && (

Description

{selectedUniversity.description}

)} {selectedUniversity.programs && selectedUniversity.programs.length > 0 && (

Programs

{selectedUniversity.programs.map((program: string, index: number) => ( {program} ))}
)} {!selectedUniversity.is_approved && (
)}
)}
); }; export default UniversityManagement;

); }; export default CheckoutCancel;

source:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { GraduationCap, Globe, Users, Award, ArrowRight, CheckCircle, Star, BookOpen, Zap, Shield, TrendingUp, Sparkles, DollarSign, Play, ChevronRight, Target, Heart, Brain, Rocket, Clock, CreditCard } from 'lucide-react'; import { useUniversities } from '../hooks/useUniversities'; import { StripeCheckout } from '../components/StripeCheckout'; import { useAuth } from '../hooks/useAuth'; import { useSubscription } from '../hooks/useSubscription'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; const Home: React.FC = () => { const { universities, loading, error } = useUniversities(); const featuredSchools = universities.slice(0, 6); const { isAuthenticated } = useAuth(); const { hasPaidProcess, loading: subscriptionLoading } = useSubscription(); // Animation variants const containerVariants = { hidden: { opacity: 0 }, visible: { opacity: 1, transition: { when: "beforeChildren", staggerChildren: 0.1 } } }; const itemVariants = { hidden: { y: 20, opacity: 0 }, visible: { y: 0, opacity: 1 } }; return (
{/* Hero Section */}
Your Gateway to U.S. Education

Unlock Your U.S. University Dream

We connect international students with exclusive scholarships at top American universities.

{subscriptionLoading ? 'Loading...' : (isAuthenticated ? (hasPaidProcess ? 'Find Scholarships' : 'Unlock Access') : 'Get Started')} Learn More
{/* Featured Universities Section */}

Featured Universities

Explore some of the top institutions offering exclusive scholarships through our platform.

{loading &&

Loading universities...

} {error &&

Error: {error}

} {!loading && !error && ( {universities.slice(0, 6).map((uni) => (

{uni.name}

{uni.location}

 ))} )}
View All Universities
{/* How It Works Section */}

How It Works

A simple, streamlined process to connect you with your future.

{/* Step 1 */}

1. Discover

Browse our curated list of scholarships from leading U.S. universities.

{/* Step 2 */}

2. Apply

Complete your profile and apply to the scholarships that fit you best.

{/* Step 3 */}

3. Succeed

Receive offers and start your journey at a U.S. university.

{/* Call to Action */}
Ready to Start?

Ready to Transform Your Future?

Join thousands of international students who have secured their educational dreams through our exclusive scholarship opportunities.

Get Started Today Learn More
); }; export default Home;

source:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { User, Brain, CheckCircle, ArrowRight, Sparkles, Target, Shield, Award, Clock, Users, FileText, Search, Heart, Star, TrendingUp, Rocket, BookOpen, DollarSign } from 'lucide-react'; const HowItWorks: React.FC = () => { return (
{/* Hero Section */}
Revolutionary Process

How It
Works

Discover how our AI-powered platform transforms your educational dreams into reality through a simple, intelligent, and comprehensive process designed for international students.

{/* Trust Indicators */}
5 Minutes Setup
95% Success Rate
100% Secure
{/* Main Process Steps */}
Simple 3-Step Process

Your Journey to
Academic Excellence

From profile creation to university enrollment, we guide you through every step with cutting-edge technology and personalized support.

{/* Step 1 */}
1

Create Your Smart Profile

Build a comprehensive academic profile using our intelligent form system. Our AI analyzes your background, achievements, and goals to create a unique student fingerprint.

Academic history & achievements
Career goals & preferences
Financial requirements
{/* Connector Arrow */}
{/* Step 2 */}
2

AI-Powered Matching

Our advanced machine learning algorithms instantly analyze thousands of scholarship opportunities and university programs to find your perfect matches.

Personalized scholarship matches
University program recommendations
Exclusive opportunity access
{/* Connector Arrow */}
{/* Step 3 */}
3

Apply & Succeed

Submit applications with confidence using our guided process. Receive comprehensive support from application to visa processing and enrollment.

Guided application process
Legal & visa support
Enrollment assistance
{/* Detailed Process Flow */}

Behind the Technology

Discover the advanced features and intelligent systems that power your success

Smart Discovery

Our AI scans thousands of opportunities daily, finding hidden scholarships that match your unique profile.

Document Management

Secure cloud storage and intelligent organization of all your academic documents and applications.

Personal Support

Dedicated counselors and AI assistants provide 24/7 support throughout your entire journey.

Success Tracking

Real-time analytics and progress tracking to optimize your application success rate.

{/* Success Stories Preview */}
Success Stories

Real Results from
Real Students

Maria Silva
MIT, Computer Science

"The AI matching found me a full scholarship I never would have discovered. The process was seamless!"

Carlos Rodriguez
Harvard, MBA

"From application to visa approval in just 3 months. The support team was incredible!"

{/* Floating Stats */}
95%
Success Rate
$50M+
Secured
{/* FAQ Section */}

Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about our revolutionary platform

How long does the entire process take?

The initial profile setup takes just 5 minutes. Our AI provides instant matches, and most students receive scholarship offers within 2-4 weeks. The complete process from application to enrollment typically takes 3-6 months.

What makes your AI matching different?

Our proprietary algorithm analyzes over 200 data points including academic performance, extracurricular activities, career goals, and personal preferences. It continuously learns from successful placements to improve match accuracy.

Is there a cost to use the platform?

Basic access is free and includes standard scholarship matching. Premium membership unlocks exclusive opportunities, personalized counseling, and comprehensive application support with a 95% success guarantee.

{/* CTA Section */}
Ready to Start?

Begin Your Journey to
Academic Success

Join thousands of international students who have transformed their educational dreams into reality through our revolutionary platform.

Create Your Profile Now Explore Scholarships
{/* Trust Indicators */}
5,000+ Students
$50M+ Secured
95% Success Rate
); }; export default HowItWorks;

source:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Building, Edit, Settings, Phone, Mail, Globe, MapPin, Users, Award, CheckCircle, AlertCircle, Camera, Save, X, Eye, EyeOff, ExternalLink } from 'lucide-react'; import { supabase } from '../../lib/supabase'; import type { University } from '../../types'; interface ProfileManagementProps { university: University | null; } const ProfileManagement: React.FC = ({ university }) => { const [isEditing, setIsEditing] = useState(false); const [showSensitiveInfo, setShowSensitiveInfo] = useState(false); const [uploading, setUploading] = useState(false); const [uploadError, setUploadError] = useState(null); const [logoUrl, setLogoUrl] = useState(university?.logo_url); const profileCompleteness = university ? ( (university.name ? 20 : 0) + (university.description ? 20 : 0) + (university.location ? 15 : 0) + (university.website ? 15 : 0) + (university.contact?.email ? 10 : 0) + (university.contact?.phone ? 10 : 0) + (university.programs && university.programs.length > 0 ? 10 : 0) ) : 0; const handleProfilePicChange = async (e: React.ChangeEvent) => { const file = e.target.files?.[0]; if (!file || !university) return; setUploading(true); setUploadError(null); try { const fileExt = file.name.split('.').pop(); const fileName = `university_${university.id}_${Date.now()}.${fileExt}`; const { error: uploadError } = await supabase.storage .from('university-profile-pictures') .upload(fileName, file, { upsert: true }); if (uploadError) throw uploadError; const { data: publicUrlData } = supabase.storage .from('university-profile-pictures') .getPublicUrl(fileName); const publicUrl = publicUrlData?.publicUrl; if (!publicUrl) throw new Error('Could not get image URL'); // Update university record const { error: updateError } = await supabase .from('universities') .update({ logo_url: publicUrl }) .eq('id', university.id); if (updateError) throw updateError; setLogoUrl(publicUrl); } catch (err: any) { setUploadError('Failed to upload image. Please try again.'); } finally { setUploading(false); } }; if (!university) { return (

University profile not found

Create your university profile to showcase your institution to international students

Create University Profile
); } return (
{/* Profile Header */}
{logoUrl ? ( ) : ( )}
{uploading && (
)} {uploadError && (
{uploadError}
)}

{university.name}

{university.location}
{university.website && ( Website )}
{university.is_approved ? ( <> University Approved ) : ( <> Pending Approval )}
{!university.profile_completed && ( Complete Profile )}
{/* Profile Completeness */}
Profile Completeness {profileCompleteness}%
{/* Main Content */}
{/* Basic Information */}

Basic Information

{!isEditing && ( )}
{isEditing ? (

source:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Award, FileText, CheckCircle, Clock, TrendingUp, Search, Target, BookOpen, ArrowUpRight, Calendar, Building, Star, Eye, CreditCard } from 'lucide-react'; import { StripeCheckout } from '../../components/StripeCheckout'; import { useAuth } from '../../hooks/useAuth'; import { DocumentUpload } from '../../components/DocumentUpload'; interface OverviewProps { profile: any; scholarships: any[]; applications: any[]; stats: { totalApplications: number; approvedApplications: number; pendingApplications: number; availableScholarships: number; }; onApplyScholarship: (scholarshipId: string) => void; } const Overview: React.FC = ({ profile, scholarships, applications, stats, onApplyScholarship }) => { const formatAmount = (amount: number) => { return new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', { style: 'currency', currency: 'USD', minimumFractionDigits: 0 }).format(amount); }; const getStatusColor = (status: string) => { switch (status) { case 'approved': return 'bg-green-100 text-green-800'; case 'rejected': return 'bg-red-100 text-red-800'; case 'under_review': return 'bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800'; default: return 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800'; } }; const getStatusIcon = (status: string) => { switch (status) { case 'approved': return CheckCircle; case 'rejected': return Clock; case 'under_review': return Clock; default: return Clock; } }; const quickActions = [ { title: 'Find Scholarships', description: 'Discover new scholarship opportunities', icon: Search, color: 'bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-500 to-blue-600', link: '/student/dashboard/scholarships', count: stats.availableScholarships }, { title: 'My Applications', description: 'Track your application status', icon: FileText, color: 'bg-gradient-to-r from-green-500 to-green-600', link: '/student/dashboard/applications', count: stats.totalApplications }, { title: 'Update Profile', description: 'Keep your profile current', icon: Target, color: 'bg-gradient-to-r from-purple-500 to-purple-600', link: '/student/dashboard/profile', count: null } ]; const { user, userProfile } = useAuth(); return (
{/* Welcome Message */}

Welcome back, {userProfile?.full_name || user?.email || 'Student'}!

Continue your journey to academic excellence

{userProfile && !userProfile.has_paid_selection_process_fee && (

Selection Process

Complete your application process

$350

Start your journey to American education by completing our comprehensive selection process.

)}

Discover Scholarships

Find opportunities that match your profile

Apply with Confidence

Get guidance throughout the process

Track Your Progress

Monitor applications in real-time

{/* Stats Cards */}

Available Scholarships

{stats.availableScholarships}

New opportunities

My Applications

{stats.totalApplications}

Total submitted

Approved

{stats.approvedApplications}

Successful

Pending

{stats.pendingApplications}

Under review
{/* Quick Actions */}
{quickActions.map((action, index) => { const Icon = action.icon; return (
{action.count !== null && ( {action.count} )}

{action.title}

{action.description}

); })}
{/* Recent Applications */}

Recent Applications

Track your scholarship applications

View All
{applications.length === 0 ? (

No applications yet

Start applying for scholarships to see your progress here

Find Scholarships
) : (
{applications.slice(0, 5).map((application) => { const StatusIcon = getStatusIcon(application.status); return (

{application.scholarship?.title}

{application.scholarship?.schoolName}
{new Date(application.applied_at).toLocaleDateString()}
{application.status.replace('_', ' ').toUpperCase()}
); })}
)}
{/* Recommended Scholarships & Profile Status */}
{/* Profile Completion */}

Profile Status

Basic information
Academic details
Documents uploaded

Complete your profile to unlock more opportunities

Complete now â†’
{/* Recommended Scholarships */}

Recommended for You

{scholarships.slice(0, 3).map((scholarship) => (

{scholarship.title}

{formatAmount(scholarship.amount)} {scholarship.schoolName}
))} {scholarships.length === 0 && (

No recommendations yet

)}
{/* Study Tips */}

ðŸ’¡ Success Tips

Apply early to increase your chances of success

Tailor your applications to each scholarship

Keep your profile updated with latest achievements

{userProfile && userProfile.documents_status !== 'approved' && ( )}
); }; export default Overview;

source:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { User, Edit, Save, X, Phone, Mail, Globe, MapPin, BookOpen, GraduationCap, Star, Award, CheckCircle, AlertCircle, Camera, Calendar, Target } from 'lucide-react'; interface ProfileManagementProps { profile: any; onUpdateProfile: (data: any) => void; } const ProfileManagement: React.FC = ({ profile, onUpdateProfile }) => { const [isEditing, setIsEditing] = useState(false); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: profile?.name || '', phone: profile?.phone || '', country: profile?.country || '', field_of_interest: profile?.field_of_interest || '', academic_level: profile?.academic_level || '', gpa: profile?.gpa?.toString() || '', english_proficiency: profile?.english_proficiency || '' }); const handleInputChange = (field: string, value: string) => { setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [field]: value })); }; const handleSave = () => { const updatedData = { ...formData, gpa: parseFloat(formData.gpa) || 0 }; onUpdateProfile(updatedData); setIsEditing(false); }; const handleCancel = () => { setFormData({ name: profile?.name || '', phone: profile?.phone || '', country: profile?.country || '', field_of_interest: profile?.field_of_interest || '', academic_level: profile?.academic_level || '', gpa: profile?.gpa?.toString() || '', english_proficiency: profile?.english_proficiency || '' }); setIsEditing(false); }; const getProfileCompleteness = () => { const fields = [ profile?.name, profile?.phone, profile?.country, profile?.field_of_interest, profile?.academic_level, profile?.gpa, profile?.english_proficiency ]; const completedFields = fields.filter(field => field && field !== '').length; return Math.round((completedFields / fields.length) * 100); }; const completeness = getProfileCompleteness(); return (
{/* Header */}

Student Profile

Manage your academic profile and preferences

{!isEditing && ( )}
{/* Profile Completeness */}

Profile Completeness

Complete your profile to unlock more scholarship opportunities

{completeness}%
Complete
{completeness < 100 && (
Complete your profile to improve scholarship matching
)}
{/* Profile Form */}
{isEditing ? (

Edit Profile

handleInputChange('name', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-4 py-3 bg-slate-50 border border-slate-200 rounded-xl focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-600 focus:border-blue-600 transition-all duration-200" placeholder="Enter your full name" />
handleInputChange('phone', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-4 py-3 bg-slate-50 border border-slate-200 rounded-xl focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-600 focus:border-blue-600 transition-all duration-200" placeholder="Your phone number" />
handleInputChange('country', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-4 py-3 bg-slate-50 border border-slate-200 rounded-xl focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-600 focus:border-blue-600 transition-all duration-200" placeholder="Your country" />
handleInputChange('gpa', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-4 py-3 bg-slate-50 border border-slate-200 rounded-xl focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-600 focus:border-blue-600 transition-all duration-200" placeholder="0.0" />
) : (
{/* Profile Header */}

{profile?.name || 'Student Name'}

{profile?.email}

Active Student Verified
{/* Profile Information */}

Personal Information

{profile?.name || 'Not provided'}

{profile?.email}

{profile?.phone || 'Not provided'}

{profile?.country || 'Not provided'}

Academic Information

{profile?.field_of_interest || 'Not provided'}

{profile?.academic_level || 'Not provided'}

{profile?.gpa || 'Not provided'}

{profile?.english_proficiency || 'Not provided'}

{/* Account Information */}

Account Information

{profile?.created_at ? new Date(profile.created_at).toLocaleDateString() : 'Unknown'}

{completeness}%

)}
{/* Profile Tips */} {completeness < 100 && (

Complete Your Profile

A complete profile helps us match you with the most relevant scholarship opportunities. Consider adding the missing information to improve your chances of finding the perfect scholarships.

{!profile?.phone && ( Add phone number )} {!profile?.country && ( Add country )} {!profile?.field_of_interest && ( Add field of interest )} {!profile?.academic_level && ( Add academic level )} {!profile?.gpa && ( Add GPA )} {!profile?.english_proficiency && ( Add English proficiency )}
)}
); }; export default ProfileManagement;
